name: update_research_data
description: This tool can be used to write the research data into a csv file

ai_tool_name.description: The name of the ai tool needs to be passed here

ai_tool_description.description: A short description about the ai tool needs to be passed here

ai_tool_link.description: The website link of the ai tool needs to be passed here

ai_tool_category.description: An appropriate category for the ai tool needs to be passed here
